title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to protect the natural environment. Explore sustainable practices and contribute to environmental conservation efforts effectively.

title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to environmental protection. Learn about natural environment challenges and develop sustainable solutions for a healthier planet.

title: Intermediate German: Countries and Landscapes
description: Examine the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries and the language used to discuss them.
learning_outcomes: Examine human and physical geography of German-speaking countries. Learn language used to discuss them. Improve vocabulary related to countries and landscapes. Enhance cultural understanding.

title: Intermediate German: Countries and Landscapes
description: Examine the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries and the language used to discuss them.

title: Intermediate French: People and Places
description: Gain an introduction to the physical and human geography of France and explore the language used to speak about them.
prerequisites: Basic French language skills (A1/A2 level) or equivalent knowledge.
learning_outcomes: Understand the physical and human geography of France. Learn and use relevant French vocabulary to discuss people and places. Enhance communication skills in French related to geographical and cultural contexts.
